song.title: Purple Overdrive
song.info:
From 64k intro called Brutlash. Released under the group name Y&D productions, but are in fact a Nature product. It's just that we didn't want to release too lame productions under our real group name. This was our first real 64k intro for the PC. We are mainly an Amiga group.
Made with Madtracker 2 in Fasttracker mode.
Download & stream: http://dvibe.se/lofi_purple.html
